text.text_translated: NASA is now trying to find some of the smaller asteroids. These are space rocks that are 140 metres wide or more. There are about 25,000 asteroids of this size, but only around 8,000 have been found so far. This means that 17,000 still have not been recorded. We know that in 2013, a 19-metre asteroid exploded above the city of Chelyabinsk in Russia and injured 1,200 people. Because of this, these medium-sized asteroids are a serious danger if they get close to Earth.

best_attempt.text_translated: NASA is now working toward finding some of the smaller asteroids, which are space rocks that are 140 metres wide or more. There are about 25,000 asteroids of this size, but so far, only around 8,000 have been found, which means 17,000 are still not recorded. We know that a 19-metre asteroid exploded above the city of Chelyabinsk in Russia in 2013 and injured 1,200 people. Because of this, these medium-sized asteroids could be a serious danger if they come close to Earth’s path.
